thread.title_full: Lace Heaven Inc. Unveils New Responsive Website Design to Improve Customer Experience

author: Patricia Chestang
title: Lace Heaven Inc. Unveils New Responsive Website Design to Improve Customer Experience
text:
Lace Heaven Inc. is excited to announce the completion of its redesigned responsive website. This new design will be live for public viewing on Thursday October 1, 2015. Thanks to new updates that will adjust the website to your screen size, visitors will always see site information in the best possible format, creating a simple and cohesive user experience. According to Search Engine Watch, a preferred source of digital business analytics, mobile internet usage exceeded PC internet usage for the first time in 2014. This shift from PC to smart phone as the preferred mobile device has led Lace Heaven Inc. to proactively make adjustments to their website design. With the site’s new responsive design, all customer devices will effectively display the proper screen size for optimal use and purchasing.
In addition to the responsiveness of the new design, the website now features easy-to-use navigation for an improved customer experience. Products are sorted by category, with easy to find and use drop-down bars for quick searching. A search bar is available and coupon specials can be found on the site homepage. Also, customers can now choose multiple colors and quantities on one page when placing an order.
Lace Heaven Inc. also makes it easy for customers to get connected. Links to the company Facebook, Twitter and Google+ accounts can be found in each page’s header for quick sharing. Testimonials, return policies, contact information and the Lace Heaven Inc. blog are prominently displayed as well. This blog site provides customers with crafting ideas, as well as advice and DIY projects for events and holidays.
To celebrate the launch of the new website, any person placing an order of $25 or more will receive 10 percent off their next order.
For more information on Lace Heaven Inc. and available products, call 251-478-5644 and visit the new website at laceheaven.com .
Since its founding in 1985, Lace Heaven Inc. has proudly provided supplies for all crafting and sewing needs. Lace Heaven Inc. offers over 8000 wholesale sewing supplies including lace, buttons, appliqués and ribbons at discounted prices.
